resources.string:
This app is for dispatchers and responders for Chaverim of the Five Towns and Far Rockaway.

If you need assistance, please dial 718-337-1800.

If you would like to volunteer, please email info@chaverim5t.org

If you are already a volunteer, click Begin below.
We sent an SMS to your phone with a verification code. When you receive that code, enter it here.
